page.title: 05Wakes Week
page.content: Well Dressing is associated with Wakes Week. This begins on the Saturday nearest to June 24th, St John the Baptist's day,to whom our church is dedicated.Each year a wakes committee organises the programme of events for the week.Part of the programme for 1985 is given here:_ {SATURDAY 22nd JUNE 1985}"YE OLDE TIDZA FAYRE";Judging of decorated shops and houses;Tea and biscuits ;Blessing of the wells;Crowning of the wakes queen;Torchlight procession.{SATURDAY {29th (BIG SATURDAY)}Tombola;"YE OLDE WORLDE FAYRE";Judging of dressing up entries;Parade of the queens;Two street processions and a Torchlight procession.Other items during the week include; Children's sports;A modelling competition; Baby show;Yard of Ale;and a Sponsored run from Miller's Dale to Tideswell.Morris Men also dance.
